input_text:
Job Title: Transition Support Associate

Location: Tampa, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Training

Description:
Job Title: Transition Support Associate
Company Overview: At Independent Financial Partners, we prioritize the advisor-client relationship and uphold the highest standards in offering personalized financial guidance. Our extensive network supports hundreds of financial advisors, benefiting from our innovative and advisor-centric approach.
Job Summary: The Transition Support Associate plays a pivotal role in welcoming advisors to our firm. You will be one of the primary points of contact for new advisors, helping them navigate the transition process smoothly and efficiently with a primary focus on moving accounts and assets. This entry-level position is ideal for enthusiastic, service-oriented individuals looking to grow their career in financial services, with a particular focus on utilizing Microsoft Excel for data management and becoming an expert on the process of re-papering accounts at various custodians.
Key Responsibilities:Support advisors in transferring their existing client portfolios to our platform, including extensive use of Microsoft Excel for data management and analysis throughout the process.Manage the re-papering process of their accounts, ensuring all documentation is present, complete, and compliant with regulatory standards.Assist in the training and onboarding of new advisors, focusing on our core technologies, operational processes, and document requirements.Collaborate closely with various teams to ensure a seamless transition experience.Address and resolve any queries or issues that arise during the transition phase.What We Are Looking For:Strong team player who is eager to learn and contribute to a dynamic team.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, capable of building relationships quickly.Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks effectively.Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including data manipulation, formula creation, and spreadsheet management – ability to do v-lookup or x-lookup is a must.
Requirements:Bachelor’s degree preferred; focus in Finance, Business, or related field is a plus.Deep familiarity MS Excel.Knowledge of investment account types.Financial certifications (SIE, Series 7) is a plus
Benefits: We offer a competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package that supports the health, happiness, and security of our employees. This includes 401(k), health benefits, paid time off, and more.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Transition Support Associate
output_json.summary: The Transition Support Associate plays a pivotal role in welcoming advisors to our firm, assisting them in navigating the transition process smoothly.
job_responsibilities: Support advisors in transferring their existing client portfolios to the platform
Manage the re-papering process of accounts
Assist in the training and onboarding of new advisors
Address and resolve queries or issues during the transition phase
output_json.company_information: Independent Financial Partners prioritizes the advisor-client relationship and offers personalized financial guidance. The company supports hundreds of financial advisors through an innovative and advisor-centric approach.

other.content: Focus in Finance, Business, or related field is preferred.
Deep familiarity with MS Excel and knowledge of investment account types are required.
